description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including theme management, game board styles, button styles, and responsive design.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Styles for the main container of the game, including max width and padding.

classes.name: score-board
classes.description: Styles for the scoreboard, including flex display and background color.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styles for the game board layout using grid.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Styles for each cell in the game board, including appearance and hover effects.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the game status message.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Base styles for buttons, including padding and cursor.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styles, including text alignment and background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including flex display settings.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning and hover effects.
